text: Hey team, how's everyone doing?
seeing some weird latency spikes on the checkout service <https://datadog.mycompany.com/d/abc-123|link to dashboard>
:alert: **Incident Declared:** High latency on Checkout API
I think it's related to the last deploy. Reverting now.
Deployment `prod-release-v2.1.5` has been rolled back.
Okay, latency is back to normal. We'll keep monitoring.
âœ… **Incident Resolved**
Noticed error rate increased in us-east-1 around 10 mins ago
deploying hotfix v2.1.6 to checkout
Graphs: <https://grafana.internal/d/checkout-latency|latency dashboard>
Mitigated by scaling replicas on checkout-api
Still seeing failed writes from the DB side
rolled back the canary to previous stable
bug traced to Redis timeouts on connection pool
Fix applied, systems stable, continuing monitoring
Investigating auth errors impacting a subset of users
checkout is down for mobile clients only
Runbook: <https://wiki.internal/runbooks/checkout-incident|checkout incident runbook>
Postmortem scheduled for tomorrow 10am PT
CI Notification: Deployment to staging complete
reverting feature flag toggle for new checkout flow
Monitoring metrics look good after revert
broken cart page on mobile Safari confirmed
deploy complete for hotfix v2.1.7
